SaveImplementation.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATAFORMTEMPLATE_EDIT_BATCHNUMBER ( @ID uniqueidentifier, @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @BATCHNUMBER nvarchar(100) ) as
set nocount on;
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate()
begin try -- handle updating the data update dbo.REVENUE_EXT set BATCHNUMBER = @BATCHNUMBER, DATECHANGED = @CURRENTDATE, CHANGEDBYID = @CHANGEAGENTID where ID = @ID
end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
return 0;
